title: The Value of Capital Increase was Doubled by the end of August 2015 (EFSA - ...
text: ( Source : EFSA - Egyptian Financial Supervisory Authority ) • Sherif Samy : Market Capitalization of listed companies is 445 billion EGP with a decline by 25% in a year • The value of Capital Increase is 28 billion pounds in eight months •
